Papposilenus is the late satyr demigod of the Satyrrides, who died under mysterious circumstances. He had eight sons:
  • Petraynus Thavker
  • Azuveloth Unedjian
  • Tashielabar
  • Abentinus
  • Geehan
  • Geddis
  • Revis Taurel
  • Barases Kahler
